ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the welcome email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISBLANK(Welcome_Email_Sent__c), ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete"), RecordType.Name = "MDP",
OR( ISBLANK(FFL_Code__c), ISBLANK(NFFL_Code__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
Please ensure the following fields are filled in before saving the record. Enter N/A for those that do not apply:
* NFFL Code * FFL Code
